title: Bad Boys After Dark: Dylan
description: The Bad Billionaires After Dark are a series of stand-alone romances that may also be enjoyed as part of the larger Love in Bloom series. Indulge your inner vixen with these sexy billionaires!Meet the Bad Boys... Four fiercely loyal, sinfully sexy, uber alpha brothers, about to fall head over heels for their leading ladies.Everything's naughtier after dark...Sinfully sexy bar owner Dylan Bad has a thing for needy women. He’s a savior, a knight in shining armor, and his mighty talented sword has no trouble bringing damsels in distress to their knees. Enter Tiffany Winters, a gorgeous cutthroat sports agent who looks like sex on legs, f**ks like she’s passion personified, and wouldn’t let a man help her if she were dangling from a ledge and he was her only hope. One night and too much tequila might change their lives forever. The question is, will either one survive?***The Bad Boys After Dark books are long enough to burn up the sheets and short enough to leave you craving more.Read the whole Billionaires After Dark series:BAD BOYS AFTER DARKMickDylanCarson (coming soon)Brett (coming soon)More Billionaires After Dark books:WILD BOYS AFTER DARK (Available Now!)LoganHeathJacksonCooperThe BILLIONAIRES AFTER DARK series is part of the LOVE IN BLOOM big family romance collection.
